price: Lut kaa sε: ”Sε mobεyε saa deε a εneε memma mmaa nie “.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
